desc: Slight probable infliction of random status ailment when attacking & 20% boost to Atk, Def

dictionary.lore: A special sphere created by the head of the Akras Summoners' Research Lab, Noel, which was made from a peculiar material found within the Vortex Gate. This Sphere not only boosts the basic abilities of its wearer, but also has the power to inflict status ailments upon its targets. However, since Noel was unsatisfied with the final product due to its instability, rumor has it that he is still researching the Metal Orb in order to improve it.

name: Metal Orb
